headline: Why the Market Dipped But NRG Energy (NRG) Gained Today
summary: NRG Energy (NRG) closed the most recent trading day at $97.11, moving +1.24% from the previous trading session.

headline: Smarter Together: Reliant and Vivint Introduce the Smarter Home Bundle
summary: HOUSTON, April 15, 2025--Recognizing the evolving needs of consumers, today Reliant introduced the Smarter Home Bundle, a new innovative offer that makes home energy management easier than ever. Qualifying current and new Reliant customers will receive a free Vivint Doorbell Camera Pro and award-winning Vivint Smart Thermostat paired with complimentary white-glove installation to ensure everything is perfectly set up from day one.
